transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, bataiye. Awaz awaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Ha wohi hai. Chalo koi dikkat nahi. Woh aise bol raha tha ki Narayana Trading Company hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Uske naam change karwana tha Narayana Pipe Fitting.
Executive: Ye sir aapke GST mein mention hai?
Customer: GST mein karwa diya abhi change.
Executive: Karwa diya change?
Customer: Thik hai. Abhi aapka ye whatsapp number hai jispe meri baat hui thi?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai GST toh GST number toh change nahi hoga sir GST pe naam change karwa diya aapne, right?
Customer: Haan GST mein pehle Narayana Trading Company tha, Narayana Pipe Fitting karwa diya.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Matlab whatsapp pe aapko hello sir likha hai. Zara dekhiye yahi hoga aapko kya.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Abhi abhi maine sir whatsapp pe aapko hello likha hai.
Customer: Haan woh maine manager se baat hui thi usko whatsapp pe maine bhej diya tha.
Executive: Achha bhej diya unko? Toh sir aap mai karwa de raha hu change. Aapko sir unko bhi phone kar dena chahiye tha. Aapko dekho sir jo aapne hamare customer care number pe phone kiya hai na aap apne account manager ko direct phone kar sakte ho sir. Koi bhi kaam karna hai aapka account manager hi kar dega sir. Aapko customer care number pe phone karne ki zarurat nahi padegi. Mai unka senior hi baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Sir achha achha. Mai aise bol raha hu ek toh woh aur koi lead weed nahi aa rahi mere ko kya matlab hai ye. Samajh nahi aa raha.
Executive: Sir lead dekho sir abhi leads ka jaise mujhe Rahul bata raha tha subah baat hui thi sir aap keh rahe the ki aapko bulk order nahi aa raha hai chhoti chhoti pieces ke buyleads aa rahe hai, right sir?
Customer: Mere ko kam se kam mere ko zyada bulk order ki bhi zarurat nahi hai. Mere ko itna chahiye 100, 200, 300, 100, 200, 300, 500, 100, 200, 300, 100, 200, 300.
Executive: Haan dekho sir abhi aapne start kiya hai abhi thoda sa time dijiye catalog ko thoda sa dekho aapke aapke kai purane IndiaMART pe sellers jude hue hai sir pehle se. Abhi aap unke beech mein aapka rotation hoga sir ek buyer jab search karega bulk order ke liye jab aapka naam bhi uske samne aayega toh order automatic aapke paas aane lagega. Abhi mai dekh raha hu toh chhoti chhoti piece ki buyleads aa rahi hai toh aapko pareshan hone ki zarurat nahi hai sir. Abhi sir aapko 400 piece ki aapne buylead consume ki thi jo aapko aayi thi Jaipur se. Thik hai. Abhi aapne uske liye chhoti chhoti quantity ki aayi hai toh aap wait karo sir. Abhi aisa nahi hai 400, 500 piece se isse bhi bade orders aapko milenge sir. Aap filter ka use kiya karo. Filter unhone bataya hoga na sir Rajasthan ke kaise filter lagate hai bulk buylead ke liye.
Customer: Haan woh karta hu mai filter use karta hu.
Executive: Haan toh woh filter ko woh use karo sir. Woh use karo aap abhi kam se kam sir mai aapko seedha seedha batau toh thoda time dena padega 15 se 20 din aur.
Executive: Kyunki sir socho aap abhi catalog pe naye registered hue ho company nayi hai log aware honge dheere dheere aapki company ke naam se automatic fir aapko samne se bhi call aayega sir aur achhe business bhi milenge.
Executive: Thik hai toh aap pareshan nahi ho. Change karwa dena aapne.
Executive: Thik hai woh kara deta hu. Baaki sir aap IndiaMART ka buylead aur lead manager. Lead manager pe jaake direct inquiry bhi aati hai sir. Please usko bhi reply kariyega. Bas buylead pe nahi inquiry bhi aati hai samne se uske bhi discuss kariyega buyer se, thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapki company ka naam change kara de raha hu sir. Aapne hamare customer care number pe phone kiya tha toh aapka jo jo problem tha jo sir aapne concern raise kiye mai resolve kara deta hu. Abhi sir ye aapka ticket raise hota hai jaise sir aap hamare customer care number pe koi bhi phone karte hai toh uska ek concern raise hota hai. Toh aap jab permission dete ho ki haan thik hai mera concern close kar dijiye toh hum usko close karte hai toh hamare liye feedback jayega sir kya.
Customer: Haan close close kar do thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants name change in GST to reflect on IndiaMART.

- Not receiving enough bulk order buyleads.



Resolution:

- Initiated the company name change process.

- Explained the importance of using filters for bulk buyleads.

- Advised to reply to direct inquiries on lead manager.

- Explained the ticket raising and closing process.



Next Steps: 

- Company name change will be processed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- name change, buyleads, filters, lead manager
